soundmark: /ðə/ /'prɑbləm/ /hæz/ /bɪn/ /sɔlvd/ /(过去已经)被解决 had been solved/ /hæd/ /bɪn/ /sɔlvd/

chinese: 那个问题(过去已经)被解决
那个问题(过去已经)通过他被解，决
english: the problem had been solved by him

chinese: 其他任何人注意到(过去)它
在其他任何人注意到(过去)它之，前
那个问题(过去已经)被他解决
english: the problem had been solved by him

chinese: 在其他任何人注意到(过去)它之，前那个问题(过去已经)被他解决
english: the problem had been solved by him before anyone else noticed it

soundmark: /bi/ /ˈpentɪd/ /(已经)被粉刷 has been painted/ /hæz/ /bɪn/ /ˈpentɪd/ /(过去已经)被粉刷 had been painted/ /hæd/ /bɪn/ /ˈpentɪd/

那个房子(过去已经)被粉刷
在他们搬(过去)进去之前那个房，子(过去已经)被粉刷
english: the house had been painted before they moved in

soundmark: /bi/ /ɪˈvækjuetɪd/ /(过去已经)被疏散 had been evacuated/ /hæd/ /bɪn/ /ɪˈvækjuetɪd/

那个建筑物(过去已经)被疏散
在火势蔓延(过去)之前那个建筑，物(过去已经)被疏散
english: the building had been evacuated before the fire spread

soundmark: /pɑrkt/ /(过去已经)被停 had been parked/ /hæd/ /bɪn/ /pɑrkt/

english: the car had been parked in the garage

english: the car had been parked in the garage before the storm

soundmark: /bi/ /kənˈstrʌktɪd/ /(过去已经)被建造 had been constructed/ /hæd/ /bɪn/ /kənˈstrʌktɪd/
